forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Clear, with a low around 51. South southwest wind around 2 mph.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 65, with temperatures falling to around 61 in the afternoon. South wind 2 to 8 mph.

weather_report:
As the evening settles into Downtown San Francisco, a gentle calm envelops the city. The skies are clear, an expanse of deep indigo laced with the promise of cooler temperatures, dipping to around 51. A whisper of a breeze, barely noticed, brushes against the skin, making this the perfect time to don a light jacket before stepping outside.

The forecast for tomorrow hints at a sun-drenched day, inviting residents to enjoy the warmth as the mercury climbs to a mild 65. The morning light will pull the fog away, leaving the atmosphere bright and invigorating. With a south wind unfurling gently, this is an opportune time for a leisurely stroll through the city’s parks or perhaps a trip to a quiet café where the comforts of a warm drink await. Embrace the day with layers—light enough to breathe during midday but warm enough for the coolness that often settles in by late afternoon. Whether catching a glimpse of the bustling waterfront or simply wandering through the eclectic streets, tomorrow promises to be a beautiful canvas upon which to paint a day spent in the charm of San Francisco.
